title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: When removing a working set, the changes are applied immediately.
OB:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered accordingly.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set.
SR:
1. The changes should not be applied immediately after removing a working set. The package view should remain filtered until a new working set is selected or the package filter is manually adjusted.
2. The working set dialog should allow for seamless deletion of working sets without causing unintended changes in the package view.
